thread.title: Amazon, Google and Microsoft in tech share surge
thread.title_full: Amazon, Google and Microsoft in tech share surge

title: Amazon, Google and Microsoft in tech share surge
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Amazon, Google and Microsoft in tech share surge The success of Amazonâ€™s new Fire tablet boosted profits Paul Sakuma/AP Alexandra Frean US Business Editor Published at 12:01AM, October 23 2015 
Amazon was among a trio of Wall Street technology heavyweights to report better than expected results last night, as it swung into a surprise profit thanks to its growing cloud computing business and the success of its new Fire tablet. 
Shares in the retailer rose by 11 per cent to $625.33 in after-hours trading as it confounded analysts by reporting a profit of $79 million instead of the loss that was expected. 
Amazon said that sales at its cloud computing unit, which provides computing power to other companies, and which the company has said may one day dwarf its retailing Subscribe now
